definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wash, wash off, away, bathe (NH = BH; Ar. rah.ad.a (also of garments); Eth. rh.z’a:, rah.az’z: sweat; cf. As. raḫâṣu, overflow, flood (on ḫ = h. v. Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 727));—

trans. wash (with water), c. acc. feet ([[רגלים]]; [[בַּמַּיִם]] oft. expr.), Ge 18:4, Ge 19:2, Ge 24:32, Ge 43:24 (all J), Ju Jdg 19:21, 1Sa 25:41, 2Sa 11:8, Ct So 5:3; [[פְּעָמָיו בְּדַם הָרָשָׁע]] ´[[יִר]]: Ps 58:11 (fig. of righteous, at ´[[י]]:’s vengeance); c. acc. hands ([[יׇדַיִם]]) De 21:6 (+ [[עַל]] over, in ceremonial, to express innocence), hence fig. [[כַּפַּי בְּנַקָּיוֹן]] ´[[אֶר]]: Ps 26:6, Ps 73:13; hands and feet Ex 30:19 (+ [[מִן]] of laver), v:Ex 30:21, Ex 40:31 (+ [[מִן]] id.; all P); c. acc. face ([[פָּנׇיו]]) Ge 43:31 (J); c. acc. pers. Ez Eze 16:9, Ex 29:4, Ex 40:12, Le 8:6 (all P), acc. [[בְּשָׂרוֹ]] (oft. ‖[[כבּס ]] of garments), Le 14:9, Le 15:13 + 9 t. P (H); c. acc. of parts of sacrificial victim Ex 29:17, Le 1:9, Le 1:13, Le 8:21, Le 9:14; wash off, away, c. acc. of filth Is 4:4 (fig.).

intrans. wash, bathe (oneself): Ex 2:5 (E), 2Sa 11:2, 2Sa 12:20, 1Ki 22:38, 2Ki 5:10, 2Ki 5:12, 2Ki 5:13, Is 1:16, Ez Eze 23:40 (+ [[ל]] pers. for whom), Ru 3:3, Le 14:8 + 14 t. P (oft. ‖[[כבּס ]]); + [[ב]] of laver 2Ch 4:6, 2Ch 4:6; of eyes, bathed in milk ([[בֶּחָלָב]]) Ct So 5:12 (fig.); Job 29:6 (fig.), v. [[הָלִיח]]. †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[רֻחָָץ]] Pr 30:12 be washed (+ [[מִן]] of filth, fig.); 2 fs. [[בְּמַיִם לאׁ רֻחַחְתְּ]] Ez Eze 16:4 (in fig.). †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[הִתְרָחַחְתִּי במו שׁלג]] Job 9:30 if I washed myself in snow (fig.).
